metadata.issue: Registry points to wrong data sources (LA County, county-level, or other cities' districts)

findings.reason: Wrong data source - URL points to 'Crime_Free_Multi_Housing_Map' layer with 53 features instead of 4 city council districts
findings.notes: Escondido has 4 council districts (established 2014). Registry URL is clearly wrong layer.

findings.reason: Wrong data source - 99.9% overflow indicates incorrect district boundaries
findings.notes: Encinitas has 4 council districts (established 2017). Feature count matches but geometry is completely outside city boundary. URL may point to different city's districts.

findings.reason: At-large city - all council members elected citywide, no geographic districts
findings.notes: Hawthorne has 5 council members (mayor + 4) all elected at-large. Registry URL points to 'Regional_Council_Districts_SCAG_Region' with 52 features (regional planning data, not city council districts).

findings.reason: At-large city - all 7 council members elected citywide, no geographic districts
findings.notes: Santa Monica has 7 council members all elected at-large. Registry URL points to 'Council_District_11_shp' with 1 feature (likely LA City Council District 11, wrong city entirely).

findings.reason: Wrong data source - URL points to 'LA_City_Council_Districts' with 15 features instead of Carson's districts
findings.notes: Carson has district-based city council (number unclear from search, but definitely not 15). Registry URL explicitly mentions 'LA_City_Council_Districts' which is Los Angeles city data (15 districts), not Carson.

findings.reason: Wrong data source - URL points to 'West_Covina_Council_Districts' with 5 features (different city entirely)
findings.notes: Registry URL explicitly mentions 'West_Covina_Council_Districts' - this is West Covina's data, not Walnut's. Could not confirm if Walnut has geographic districts or at-large elections from search results.

findings.reason: At-large city - all 5 council members elected citywide, no geographic districts
findings.notes: San Jacinto has 5 council members all elected at-large. Registry URL points to 'Hemet_Council_Districts' with 5 features (Hemet is a different city, though adjacent to San Jacinto).

findings.reason: Wrong data source - URL returns 4 features but 100% overflow indicates incorrect geometry
findings.notes: Perris has 4 council districts (established 2022). Feature count matches expected, but 100% overflow indicates the geometry is completely wrong. URL may point to outdated or incorrect district boundaries.

findings.reason: Wrong data source - URL points to 'Council_Districts_Perris' with 5 features (Perris has 4 districts, Menifee has 4 districts)
findings.notes: Menifee has 4 council districts. Registry URL explicitly mentions 'Council_Districts_Perris' and returns 5 features. This is Perris city data, not Menifee.

findings.reason: At-large city - all 5 council members elected citywide, no geographic districts
findings.notes: La Cañada Flintridge has 5 council members all elected at-large. Registry URL points to 'Enriched Council_District' with 7 features (likely LA County or regional data).

wrong_data_cities: Escondido (0622804) - Crime housing map, not council districts
Carson (0611530) - LA City Council districts (15) not Carson
Walnut (0683332) - West Covina districts not Walnut
Perris (0656700) - Wrong geometry despite correct count

pattern_analysis.primary_issue: Automated discovery selected wrong ArcGIS layers
common_patterns: LA County/LA City data for unrelated cities
Adjacent city's districts (West Covina→Walnut, Perris→Menifee, Hemet→San Jacinto)
Regional planning districts instead of municipal council districts
Wrong layer types (crime maps, housing maps) with similar naming

immediate: Add to quarantined-portals.ts with documented rationale
Remove 4 at-large city entries from known-portals.ts
follow_up: Research correct data sources for 6 quarantined district-based cities
Verify Walnut's governance structure (at-large vs district)
Add pre-validation checks for centroid distance and feature count ratio
